main.name: Amanuel Etana
main.occupation: Java + React developer, Educator and Entrepreneur
main.description: Full Stack Developer with expertise in Java, Node, React & ReactNative.
main.bio: My name is Amanuel, I'm a Full Stack Developer. Currently I'm studying Computer Programming at MIU. I have been lecturing and managing lab since 2006 E.C in AKU and ASTU. I have also thought major computer programing and networking courses. In addition to that I have also conducted projects and advised students on their final year project that involves circuit design and programming microcontroller. I am also people person and passionate to share my knowledge to others and benefit anyone with my experience gathered so far. So I look forward to hear from you, as this is my ideal place to work and develop my carrier.I enjoy solving problems and bringing ideas to life
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, Hire me for a project or anything else.

testimonials.text: Enthusiast person with a great work ethic! will definitely hire him again for my future projects. Finished all the assigned task with great quality and met the deadline.

That Amanuel Etana must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
